intension: Design a flyer for a book fair with free drinks and snacks, showcasing the variety of books available and the discount offered. The website address is www.yourweb.com and the fair is scheduled for Monday to Friday, 22 May 2023 at 10:00 AM.
globalcaption: The image features a stack of books with a sign on top of them, advertising a book fair. The books are arranged in a pile, with some books placed on top of each other. The sign is placed on top of the books, drawing attention to the book fair. The books are of various sizes and are placed in a visually appealing manner.
keywords: book, read, reading, education, store, shop, tb, flyer, illustration, beige, literature, fair, event

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a stack of books with a total of six books piled on top of each other. The books are of various sizes and are arranged in a somewhat disorganized manner. The stack is positioned in the center of the image, with the books occupying most of the space
